answers.answer: Are you taking any meds?  I have the same thing going on but i think it may be related to some meds i'm taking.
I had this and I found out way later that my iron and potassium levels were a little low as soon as I ate foods rich in these nurtrients, I felt better.good luck

question: im male and 20 years old, i have been suffering from light headeness for 3 months and it is a constant feeling. the only other symptom is mild spasms in my arms and legs but nothing too severe. the doctor has checked my ears and says there are no infections, i hav blood tests for glandular fever and thyroid problems as well as diabetes. none of the results came back positive. any help would be appreciated as the longer it lasts the more i worry!
title: constant light headed feeling lasted 3 months so far
